summary: Pointing out the importance of maintaining a playful spirit, which we all have when we are kids and society forces us to abandon in our adult lives, Drops of Joy is a documentary that speaks widely about the idea that playing is something very serious and urgent.
cast: Alberto Ikeda|Alfredo Bello|Andrea Jabor|Antônio Nóbrega|Braulio Tavares|David Reeks|Dinda Salustiano|Domingos Montagner|Helder Vasconcelos|Hélio Leites|José Simão|Laura Tamiana|Lucilene Silva|Luiza Marmello|Lydia Hortelio|Maciel Salú|Manoel Kobachuk|Marcelino Freire|Márcio Libar|Maria Amélia Pereira|Mestre Aguinaldo|Paulo Dias|Pedro Salustiano|Renata Meirelles|Ricardo Goldenberg|Rosane Almeida|Tia Maria do Jongo|Tião Carvalho|Vera Cristina Athayde|Wandi Doratiotto
title: Tarja Branca
